abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have less than 6 cards in your hand, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. This power can't be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: If Porygon2 has a Technical Machine card attached to it, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Asleep and Burned.
